SpeechNode.text: Is that so? Well, when Rann blankets Valest with Shadow, then don't expect to find solice here. Begone!
SpeechNode.name: CedarA

SpeechNode.text: Thank you for coming back. The forest is the last bastion for hope. Peace is all around us- Bounty is permeating from the Woods. We Fairies want to protect the Forest for as long as we can. If not us, then who? We have waited for the Hero to conquer evil, but he has not shown up.
SpeechNode.name: Cedar2

SpeechNode.text: How charming, a woman saving all living things and the World? That is a wonderul tale, but not reality.
SpeechNode.name: Cedar3
